title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Exceptionally presented mansion apartment with river views

Location

Riverview Gardens is situated in North Barnes within a short walk of Hammersmith Bridge. Barnes village is close by with its pretty duck pond offers an eclectic mix of good independent retailers, pubs, coffee shops and highly regarded restaurants, as well as the popular Olympic Cinema. There is also a renowned weekly Barnes Farmers Market.

For those who commute there are good bus services to Richmond and Putney as well as Barnes and Barnes Bridge stations which provide a good service into Waterloo. Hammersmith Underground is also nearby.

The schools in the area include St Paul's, The Harrodian, The Swedish School and Ibstock Place School. For younger pupils there is St Paul's Juniors, St Osmund's (rc) and Barnes Primary School.

Description

This beautifully presented mansion apartment has an abundance of natural light throughout with high ceilings, elegant windows and a delightful outlook over the communal gardens and the River Thames beyond.

The apartment is approached, via a secure phone entry system, into a well presented communal area with stairs leading up to the apartment on the second floor.

The welcoming entrance hall is laid with hardwood flooring and benefits from built in storage cupboards.

The light and spacious kitchen/dining/reception room is laid with hardwood flooring and benefits from views of the communal gardens and the River Thames beyond, with French doors leading out onto an attractive balcony. The kitchen/dining/reception room has been arranged so there is a dining area as well as a reception room area featuring a marble fireplace with gas fire and built in wooden shelving and TV unit. The Northpoint bespoke kitchen features wall and base level units with Caesarstone work surfaces and a breakfast bar area. There is an inset sink with drinking water tap, an inset Siemens induction hob with hidden extractor hood above, 2 Siemens ovens and warming drawer, a Siemens dishwasher and a Miele fridge/freezer.

The master bedroom has French doors leading out onto a balcony, a marble fireplace with a gas fire and built in wardrobes. The tiled en suite bathroom has a stand alone bath, a separate shower, a Duravit basin with under sink unit and benefits from French doors leading out onto a balcony looking out to the communal gardens and river beyond.

Specification:
• Radio frequency lighting throughout the apartment
• Under floor electrical heating in both bathrooms
• Wired for a Sonos sound system in the kitchen/dining/reception room, master bedroom and en suite bathroom. With speakers in the kitchen and en suite bathroom ceiling
• New electrics and plumbing including water conditioner for hard water)
• New gas central heating system with Hudevad radiators, Megaflo tank and Vaillant boiler
• Sound insulation under the wooden flooring, in the party wall and the walls separating the bedrooms
• Cornicing and skirting boards have been replaced throughout • Wiring for TV in the kitchen/dining/reception room and in both bedrooms

Square Footage: 1434 sq ft

detailedDescription:

detailedDescription:
Summary
This truly stunning four bedroom semi-detached residence is situated on one of East Sheen's most favoured Roads. The property retains its charm and character, with an extended kitchen/breakfast room with bi-folding doors onto a beautiful garden.

Description
This beautifully well-presented four bedroom semi-detached property positioned on a sought after Parkside road. This lovely family home provides spacious living accommodation throughout with an extremely high specification finish. The ground floor offers a deep entrance hallway with the added benefit of a downstairs WC. Leading off the hallway is a beautiful front reception room with period features. The ground floor also has a desirable fitted modern kitchen/diner with bi folding doors leading onto to the secluded rear garden. The first and second floor offers four generous sized bedrooms and a lovely family bathroom. All presented in pristine condition. The top floor has had the loft fully extended which offers a large master bedroom and an impressive en-suite.

detailedDescription:
Two double bedroom flat, extremely well presented and with access onto a decked, second floor outside area affording pleasant far reaching elevated views.

The property which has its own private entrance is arranged over first and second floors and is presented in good order offering bright, well proportioned accommodation with replacement double glazing and further attractive views to the front along Alexandra Road. Situated within walking distance of local shopping amenities, Kew Gardens underground station and North Sheen mainline station.

detailedDescription:
Set within this popular development in Hampton which is ideal for downsizers and professionals, is this smart and spacious two double bedroom ground floor flat with direct access onto the communal gardens which back onto Bushy Park.

Kings Paddock is perfectly located in a quiet cul-de-sac off Hampton High Street, extremely convenient for shops, restaurants, transport links, Bushy Park, Hampton Pool and the River Thames.
